title: Module 46: AI Basics
description: Introduction to fundamental AI concepts for advanced learners
objectives: Explain supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning
Describe neural network structure and function

mcqs.question: What is the primary goal of supervised learning?
options: To make predictions without labeled data
To make predictions with labeled data
To discover patterns in unlabeled data
To optimize rewards in an environment

mcqs.question: What type of learning involves an agent learning to take actions to maximize rewards?

flashcards.back: A type of machine learning where the model is trained on labeled data to make predictions
A computer system inspired by the structure and function of the human brain, used for machine learning tasks

generated_text:
"Module 46: AI Basics" (10-minute video)

For advanced learners, this module introduces fundamental AI concepts. We'll explore key terminology, machine learning types, and neural network basics. Through interactive visuals and examples, you'll understand how AI systems process data and make decisions. Key takeaways include:

* Defining AI and its applications
* Supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning
* Neural network structure and function

By the end of this module, you'll have a solid foundation in AI principles, enabling you to apply this knowledge in real-world scenarios.
